issue.title: Remove external (CDN) version of jQuery
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

\joomla\components\com_easysdi_core\views\application\tmpl\default.php
\joomla\components\com_easysdi_core\views\versionform\tmpl\default.php
\joomla\components\com_easysdi_core\views\versionrelationform\tmpl\default.php

```

getScript('//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.9.1/jquery.min.js', function() {
```


Is there any problems with the joomla packaged version ?

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

There is no visible reason to keep them.
OK from COTEC to replace them by standard joomla JQ
